p: Resuspend the final pellet in 6.0 mL Leibovitz's L-15 culture medium supplemented with 20% fetal bovine serum, 1.5% penicillin/streptavidin and 1.% Fungizone, 1.5% kanamycin and 1.5% tetracycline (this solution will be referred to as supplemented Leibovitz's). Leibovitz's medium was selected for cell culture because it is CO 2 independent; thus, cells require no O 2 or CO 2 supplementation. This media also maintains physiological pH through salts, high concentration of basic amino acids and galactose. and vortex. If scales are evident in the tube, allow the tube to stand vertically for 15 s—the scales will settle to the bottom. Avoiding the scales if present, remove the media/cell solution from the conical vial with a sterile Pasteur pipet and transfer to a sterile T25 flask with a vented cap (Corning).
